name: I Got Your Back
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Noelle, equip this card.
After Noelle equips this card, immediately use Breastplate once.
After Noelle uses a Normal Attack: If this card and Full Plate are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Noelle in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1602]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1602] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16022]</color> once.
After <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1602] uses a Normal Attack:</color> If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116021]</color> are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1602] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Noelle</color>, equip this card.
After Noelle equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> once.
After <color=#FFFFFFFF>Noelle uses a Normal Attack:</color> If this card and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Full Plate</color> are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Noelle in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: A stout heart is the sternest armor.
source: Reward for inviting Noelle to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
